import React from "react"; import { StyledSortBy } from "./Styles/StyledSortBy"; const SortBy = ({changeStateSorting})=> { const changeStateAsc = event => { const {value}= event.target changeStateSorting(value, "asc"); }; const changeStateDesc = event => { const {value}= event.target changeStateSorting(value, "desc"); }; return (
); } export default SortBy;
